arXiv:2410.05295v4 [cs.CR] 22 Apr 2025

AutoDAN-Turbo: A Lifelong Agent for Strategy Self-Exploration to Jailbreak LLMs
AutoDAN-Turbo：一种用于策略自我探索以破解 LLMs 的终身智能体

Xiaogeng Liu ∗1   Peiran Li ∗1   Edward Suh 2,3   Yevgeniy Vorobeychik 4   Zhuoqing Mao 5  
Somesh Jha 1   Patrick McDaniel 1   Huan Sun 6   Bo Li 7   Chaowei Xiao 1
1 University of Wisconsin–Madison 2 NVIDIA 3 Cornell University
4 Washington University, St. Louis 5 University of Michigan, Ann Arbor
6 The Ohio State University 7 UIUC
Abstract  摘要

In this paper, we propose AutoDAN-Turbo, a black-box jailbreak method that can automatically discover as many jailbreak strategies as possible from scratch, without any human intervention or predefined scopes (e.g., specified candidate strategies), and use them for red-teaming. As a result, AutoDAN-Turbo can significantly outperform baseline methods, achieving a 74.3%percent74.374.3\%74.3 % higher average attack success rate on public benchmarks. Notably, AutoDAN-Turbo achieves an 88.588.588.588.5 attack success rate on GPT-4-1106-turbo. In addition, AutoDAN-Turbo is a unified framework that can incorporate existing human-designed jailbreak strategies in a plug-and-play manner. By integrating human-designed strategies, AutoDAN-Turbo can even achieve a higher attack success rate of 93.493.493.493.4 on GPT-4-1106-turbo.
在本文中，我们提出了 AutoDAN-Turbo，这是一种黑盒破解方法，可以从头开始自动发现尽可能多的破解策略，无需任何人工干预或预定义范围（例如，指定的候选策略），并使用它们进行红队演练。因此，AutoDAN-Turbo 可以显著优于基线方法，在公共基准测试上实现 74.3%percent74.374.3\%74.3 % 更高的平均攻击成功率。值得注意的是，AutoDAN-Turbo 在 GPT-4-1106-turbo 上实现了 88.588.588.588.5 的攻击成功率。此外，AutoDAN-Turbo 是一个统一的框架，可以以即插即用的方式整合现有的人工设计的破解策略。通过整合人工设计的策略，AutoDAN-Turbo 甚至可以在 GPT-4-1106-turbo 上实现 93.493.493.493.4 更高的攻击成功率。

1 Introduction  1 引言

Large language models (LLMs) have been widely deployed in recent years due to their advanced capabilities in understanding and generating human-like text (Ouyang et al., 2022). To ensure these models behave responsibly, safety alignment has been proposed. This alignment enables LLMs to provide more helpful, appropriate, and safe responses, particularly in the face of harmful instructions or questions. However, jailbreak attacks have emerged as a significant threat to aligned LLMs (Wei et al., 2023; Zou et al., 2023; Chao et al., 2023; Shen et al., 2023; Liu et al., 2024; Liao & Sun, 2024). These attacks leverage carefully designed prompts to trick the LLMs into losing their safety alignment and providing harmful, discriminatory, violent, or sensitive content. To maintain the responsible behaviors of LLMs, it is crucial to investigate automatic jailbreak attacks. These attacks serve as essential red-teaming tools, proactively assessing whether LLMs can behave responsibly and safely in adversarial environments (Zou et al., 2023).
近年来，由于大型语言模型（LLMs）在理解和生成类人文本方面的先进能力，它们已被广泛部署（Ouyang 等人，2022）。为确保这些模型负责任地运行，提出了安全对齐。这种对齐使 LLMs 能够提供更有帮助、更恰当和更安全的响应，特别是在面对有害指令或问题时。然而，越狱攻击已成为对齐 LLMs 的重大威胁（Wei 等人，2023；Zou 等人，2023；Chao 等人，2023；Shen 等人，2023；Liu 等人，2024；Liao & Sun，2024）。这些攻击利用精心设计的提示来欺骗 LLMs，使其失去安全对齐并提供有害、歧视性、暴力或敏感内容。为保持 LLMs 的负责任行为，研究自动越狱攻击至关重要。这些攻击作为重要的红队工具，主动评估 LLMs 在对抗性环境中能否负责任且安全地运行（Zou 等人，2023）。

Existing jailbreak attacks for LLMs face several limitations. While several automatic jailbreak methods, such as PAIR (Chao et al., 2023), and TAP (Mehrotra et al., 2024) have been proposed, However, since these methods lack guidance for jailbreak knowledge, the diversity and effectiveness of the jailbreak prompts generated by such attacks are often unsatisfying. To address it, a few jailbreak methods navigate the complexities of language—such as its inherently multi-lingual, context-dependent, and socially nuanced properties for red-teaming. They have utilized human-developed social engineering, exploiting cultural norms, or leveraging cross-lingual ambiguities ( which we refer to as “strategies”) to compromise the LLMs (Shen et al., 2023; Zeng et al., 2024; Yong et al., 2024). For example, strategies such as cipher  (Yuan et al., 2024; Lv et al., 2024), ASCII-based techniques (Jiang et al., 2024), very long contexts (Anil et al., ) and low-resource language-based strategies (Yong et al., 2024) have been proposed to jailbreak LLMs. Human persuasion strategies, such as false promises and threats, are also utilized to jailbreak LLMs (Zeng et al., 2024). Although these "strategy-based jailbreak attacks" are intriguing, they still face two major limitations. Firstly, these attacks rely on human intervention to manually devise the strategies, which requires significant labor and limits the scope of strategies to the imagination of the human designer. Secondly, these methods typically employ only a single strategy, leaving the potential for combining and synergizing diverse strategies to create stronger jailbreak attacks largely unexplored.
现有的针对 LLMs 的越狱攻击面临一些局限性。虽然已经提出了几种自动越狱方法，例如 PAIR（Chao 等人，2023 年）和 TAP（Mehrotra 等人，2024 年），然而，由于这些方法缺乏越狱知识的指导，此类攻击生成的越狱提示的多样性和有效性往往不尽如人意。为了解决这个问题，一些越狱方法应对了语言的复杂性，例如其固有的多语言性、依赖上下文以及社会细微特性，用于红队演练。它们利用人类开发的社会工程学，利用文化规范，或利用跨语言歧义（我们称之为“策略”）来破坏 LLMs（Shen 等人，2023 年；Zeng 等人，2024 年；Yong 等人，2024 年）。例如，已经提出了诸如密码（Yuan 等人，2024 年；Lv 等人，2024 年）、基于 ASCII 的技术（Jiang 等人，2024 年）、非常长的上下文（Anil 等人）和基于低资源语言的策略（Yong 等人，2024 年）等策略来越狱 LLMs。 人类说服策略，如虚假承诺和威胁，也被用于破解 LLMs（Zeng 等人，2024）。尽管这些“基于策略的破解攻击”很有趣，但它们仍然面临两个主要限制。首先，这些攻击依赖于人工干预来手动设计策略，这需要大量劳动，并将策略范围限制在人类设计者的想象力之内。其次，这些方法通常只采用单一策略，而将结合和协同不同策略以创建更强的破解攻击的可能性很大程度上未被探索。

In this paper, to address the above limitations, we propose AutoDAN-Turbo, an innovative method that utilizes lifelong learning agents to automatically and continually discover diverse strategies, combine the discovered strategies, and leverage the strategies for jailbreak attacks without human intervention, as shown in Fig. 1. Our method has the following features: First, Automatic Strategy Discovery: Our jailbreak framework can automatically discover as many jailbreak strategies as possible from scratch, without any human intervention or predefined scopes (e.g., specified candidate strategies). Specifically, AutoDAN-Turbo can autonomously develop new strategies during the exploration, and also systematically store these strategies in an organized structure. This enables the model to effectively reuse discovered strategies and evolve based on existing strategies, potentially combining them into more advanced approaches, for new attack attempts. Second, External Strategy Compatibility: AutoDAN-Turbo is a unified framework that can leverage existing human-designed jailbreak strategies in a plug-and-play manner. We can easily reformat the existing/external strategy and put them into AutoDAN-Turbo’s strategy library. This enables AutoDAN-Turbo to leverage the existing strategies and develop new advanced jailbreak attack strategies based on both external jailbreak strategies and its own discoveries. Third, Practical Usage: Our method works in a black-box manner, which only requires access to the model’s textual output.
在本文中，为解决上述局限性，我们提出了 AutoDAN-Turbo，这是一种创新的方法，它利用终身学习智能体自动且持续地发现多样化策略，整合已发现的策略，并在无需人工干预的情况下利用这些策略进行越狱攻击，如图 1 所示。我们的方法具有以下特点：首先，自动策略发现：我们的越狱框架可以从零开始自动发现尽可能多的越狱策略，无需任何人工干预或预定义范围（例如，指定的候选策略）。具体来说，AutoDAN-Turbo 可以在探索过程中自主开发新策略，并系统地以结构化的方式存储这些策略。这使得模型能够有效地重用已发现的策略，并在现有策略的基础上进行进化，有可能将它们组合成更高级的方法，用于新的攻击尝试。其次，外部策略兼容性：AutoDAN-Turbo 是一个统一的框架，可以以即插即用的方式利用现有的人工设计的越狱策略。 我们可以轻松地重新格式化现有的/外部的策略，并将它们放入 AutoDAN-Turbo 的策略库中。这使得 AutoDAN-Turbo 能够利用现有策略，并基于外部的越狱策略和自身的发现来开发新的高级越狱攻击策略。第三，实际应用：我们的方法以黑盒方式工作，只需要能够访问模型的文本输出。

We conduct extensive experiments on public benchmarks and datasets (Mazeika et al., 2024; Souly et al., 2024; Lapid et al., 2024; Qiu et al., 2023; Zou et al., 2023; Luo et al., 2024) to evaluate our method. The results demonstrate that our method is capable of automatically discovering jailbreak strategies and achieving high attack success rates on both open-sourced and closed-sourced LLMs in a black-box manner, surpassing the runner-up baseline (Samvelyan et al., 2024) by 74.3%percent74.374.3\%74.3 % on average across different victim models on Harmbench (Mazeika et al., 2024). Additionally, evaluated by the StrongREJECT score (Souly et al., 2024), our method shows outstanding performance on inducing the LLM to provide request-relevant malicious content, surpassing the runner-up basline (Samvelyan et al., 2024) by 92.3%percent92.392.3\%92.3 %. Notably, our method demonstrates remarkable jailbreak effectiveness on GPT-4-1106-turbo (OpenAI et al., 2024), achieving an 88.588.588.588.5 attack success rate. In addition, our evaluations validate that the strategy library developed by AutoDAN-Turbo exhibits strong transferability, maintaining high attack success rates across different target models and different datasets. Furthermore, due to its excellent compatibility of our framework, our method can incorporate with existing human-developed jailbreak strategies and achieve even higher attack performance. By integrating 7777 human-designed jailbreak strategies (Ding et al., 2024; Jiang et al., 2024; Lv et al., 2024; Pedro et al., 2023; Upadhayay & Behzadan, 2024; Yao et al., 2024; Yuan et al., 2024) from academic papers, AutoDAN-Turbo can even achieve a higher attack success rate of 93.493.493.493.4 on GPT-4-1106-turbo.
我们在公开基准和数据集（Mazeika 等人，2024 年；Souly 等人，2024 年；Lapid 等人，2024 年；Qiu 等人，2023 年；Zou 等人，2023 年；Luo 等人，2024 年）上进行了广泛的实验，以评估我们的方法。结果表明，我们的方法能够自动发现越狱策略，并以黑盒方式在开源和闭源 LLM 上实现高攻击成功率，在 Harmbench 上（Mazeika 等人，2024 年）平均超越亚军基线（Samvelyan 等人，2024 年） 74.3%percent74.374.3\%74.3 % 。此外，根据 StrongREJECT 分数（Souly 等人，2024 年）评估，我们的方法在诱导 LLM 提供与请求相关的恶意内容方面表现出色，超越亚军基线（Samvelyan 等人，2024 年） 92.3%percent92.392.3\%92.3 % 。值得注意的是，我们的方法在 GPT-4-1106-turbo（OpenAI 等人，2024 年）上展现出显著的越狱效果，实现了 88.588.588.588.5 的攻击成功率。此外，我们的评估验证了 AutoDAN-Turbo 开发的策略库具有很强的可迁移性，在不同目标模型和不同数据集上均保持高攻击成功率。 此外，由于我们框架的出色兼容性，我们的方法可以与现有的人类开发的越狱策略相结合，并实现更高的攻击性能。通过整合来自学术论文中人类设计的越狱策略（Ding 等人，2024 年；Jiang 等人，2024 年；Lv 等人，2024 年；Pedro 等人，2023 年；Upadhayay & Behzadan，2024 年；Yao 等人，2024 年；Yuan 等人，2024 年），AutoDAN-Turbo 甚至可以在 GPT-4-1106-turbo 上实现高达 93.493.493.493.4 的更高攻击成功率。

2 Related Works  2 相关工作

Existing jailbreaks mainly follow two methodological lines. The first is the optimization-based attack (Zou et al., 2023; Chao et al., 2023; Liu et al., 2024; Zhu et al., 2023; Guo et al., 2024; Liao & Sun, 2024; Paulus et al., 2024), which leverages an automatic algorithm to generate jailbreak prompts based on certain feedbacks, such as gradients of a loss function (Zou et al., 2023; Liu et al., 2024; Zhu et al., 2023; Guo et al., 2024; Chao et al., 2023; Mehrotra et al., 2024), or training a generator to imitate such optimization algorithms (Liao & Sun, 2024; Paulus et al., 2024). However, these automatic jailbreak attacks do not provide explicit jailbreak knowledge for the attack algorithm, often resulting in weak attack performance and limited diversity in the generated jailbreak prompts. Another line of work that addresses this issue is the strategy-based attack (Zeng et al., 2024). Compared to optimization-based methods, strategy-based jailbreak attacks do not necessarily require an automatic algorithm (though they sometimes do). Instead, the core of strategy-based jailbreak methods is to leverage specific jailbreak strategies to compromise the LLMs. For example, one of the earliest known jailbreak attacks against LLMs, the "Do-Anything-Now (DAN)" series (walkerspider, 2022; Shen et al., 2023) leverage the role-playing strategy and prompts the LLMs to role-play as another assistant who has no ethical constraints. Strategy-based jailbreak attacks (walkerspider, 2022; Shen et al., 2023; Wang et al., 2024b; Samvelyan et al., 2024; Jin et al., 2024; Yuan et al., 2024; Lv et al., 2024; Ding et al., 2024; Jiang et al., 2024; Pedro et al., 2023; Upadhayay & Behzadan, 2024; Yao et al., 2024; Anil et al., ; Wei et al., 2024; Xu et al., 2024) often utilize human-designed strategies at the core of their approach. For example, the role-playing strategy has been widely used in many jailbreak attacks (walkerspider, 2022; Shen et al., 2023; Wang et al., 2024b; Samvelyan et al., 2024), such as GUARD (Jin et al., 2024), which mainly discusses the implementation and refinement of the role-playing jailbreak strategy. Rainbow Teaming (Samvelyan et al., 2024) utilizes 8888 predefined strategies, such as emotional manipulation and wordplay, to generate jailbreak prompts. And PAP (Zeng et al., 2024) explores the possibility of using 40404040 human-discovered persuasion schemes to jailbreak LLMs. Other jailbreak strategies, such as ciphered  (Yuan et al., 2024; Lv et al., 2024), ASCII-based techniques (Jiang et al., 2024), long contexts (Anil et al., ), low-resource language-based strategies (Yong et al., 2024), malicious demonstration (Wei et al., 2024), and veiled expressions (Xu et al., 2024) also reveal many interesting aspects of jailbreak vulnerabilities of LLMs.
现有的越狱方法主要遵循两种方法论路线。第一种是基于优化的攻击（Zou 等人，2023；Chao 等人，2023；Liu 等人，2024；Zhu 等人，2023；Guo 等人，2024；Liao & Sun，2024；Paulus 等人，2024），它利用自动算法根据某些反馈生成越狱提示，例如损失函数的梯度（Zou 等人，2023；Liu 等人，2024；Zhu 等人，2023；Guo 等人，2024；Chao 等人，2023；Mehrotra 等人，2024），或者训练一个生成器来模仿这些优化算法（Liao & Sun，2024；Paulus 等人，2024）。然而，这些自动越狱攻击没有为攻击算法提供明确的越狱知识，通常导致攻击性能较弱，并且生成的越狱提示多样性有限。解决此问题的另一条工作路线是基于策略的攻击（Zeng 等人，2024）。与基于优化的方法相比，基于策略的越狱攻击不一定需要自动算法（尽管有时也需要）。相反，基于策略的越狱方法的核心是利用特定的越狱策略来破坏 LLMs。 例如，针对 LLMs 最早期的已知越狱攻击之一，即"立即行动（DAN）"系列（walkerspider，2022；Shen 等人，2023），利用角色扮演策略，提示 LLMs 扮演另一个没有道德约束的助手。基于策略的越狱攻击（walkerspider，2022；Shen 等人，2023；Wang 等人，2024b；Samvelyan 等人，2024；Jin 等人，2024；Yuan 等人，2024；Lv 等人，2024；Ding 等人，2024；Jiang 等人，2024；Pedro 等人，2023；Upadhayay & Behzadan，2024；Yao 等人，2024；Anil 等人；Wei 等人，2024；Xu 等人，2024）通常在其方法核心利用人类设计的策略。例如，角色扮演策略已被广泛应用于许多越狱攻击（walkerspider，2022；Shen 等人，2023；Wang 等人，2024b；Samvelyan 等人，2024），如 GUARD（Jin 等人，2024），主要讨论了角色扮演越狱策略的实施和改进。Rainbow Teaming（Samvelyan 等人，2024）利用 8888 预定义的策略，如情感操纵和文字游戏，来生成越狱提示。 并且 PAP（Zeng 等人，2024）探索了使用人类发现的说服方案来破解 LLMs 的可能性。其他破解策略，如加密（Yuan 等人，2024；Lv 等人，2024）、基于 ASCII 的技术（Jiang 等人，2024）、长上下文（Anil 等人。,),低资源语言策略（Yong 等人，2024）、恶意演示（Wei 等人，2024）和隐晦表达（Xu 等人，2024）也揭示了 LLMs 破解漏洞的许多有趣方面。

However, existing strategy-based attacks face two limitations: reliance on predefined strategies and limited exploration of combining different methods. To address these, we propose AutoDAN-Turbo, an autonomous system that discovers, evolves, and stores strategies without human intervention. It can also incorporate human-designed strategies, creating advanced attacks by combining both. This framework treats all LLMs as end-to-end black-box models, ensuring flexibility and adaptability.
然而，现有的基于策略的攻击面临两个限制：依赖预定义的策略和不同方法的组合探索有限。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了 AutoDAN-Turbo，一个无需人工干预即可发现、进化和存储策略的自主系统。它还可以结合人类设计的策略，通过结合两者来创建高级攻击。该框架将所有 LLMs 视为端到端黑盒模型，确保灵活性和适应性。

3 AutoDAN-Turbo

As illustrated in Fig. 2, our method consists of three main modules: the Attack generation and Exploration Module (Sec. 3.1) , Strategy Library Construction Module (Sec. 3.2), and Jailbreak Strategy Retrieval Module (Sec. 3.3). In the Attack generation and Exploration Module, where the goals are to generate jailbreak prompt to attack the target LLM by leveraging the strategies provided by Jailbreak Strategy Retrieval Module, it consists of an attacker LLM that generates jailbreak prompts based on specific strategies retrieved from Jailbreak Strategy Retrieval Module; a target (victim) LLM that provides responses; and a scorer LLM that evaluates these responses to assign scores. We can repeat this process multiple time to generate massive attack logs for Strategy Library Construction Module to generate a strategy library. Strategy Library Construction Module is to extract strategies from the attack logs generated in Attack Generation and Exploration Module and save the strategies into the Strategy Library; Jailbreak Strategy Retrieval Module is to support the Attack Generation and Exploration Module to retrieve the strategy from the strategy library constructed by Strategy Library Construction Module so that the retrieved jailbreak prompt can guide the jailbreak prompt generation to attack the victim LLMs. The algorithmic outline is provided in Appendix. D.
如图 2 所示，我们的方法由三个主要模块组成：攻击生成与探索模块（第 3.1 节）、策略库构建模块（第 3.2 节）和越狱策略检索模块（第 3.3 节）。在攻击生成与探索模块中，目标是通过利用越狱策略检索模块提供的策略来生成越狱提示以攻击目标 LLM，该模块包括一个基于从越狱策略检索模块检索的特定策略生成越狱提示的攻击者 LLM；一个提供响应的目标（受害者）LLM；以及一个评估这些响应并分配分数的评分者 LLM。我们可以重复此过程多次，为策略库构建模块生成大量攻击日志，以构建策略库。 策略库构建模块用于从攻击生成与探索模块生成的攻击日志中提取策略，并将策略保存至策略库；越狱策略检索模块用于支持攻击生成与探索模块从策略库构建模块构建的策略库中检索策略，以便检索到的越狱提示能够指导越狱提示生成，以攻击目标 LLMs。算法概要见附录 D。

By leveraging these three modules, the framework can continuously automatically devise jailbreak strategies, reuse strategies, and evolve from existing strategies, thus ensuring the feature of automatic strategy discovery and evolvement. In addition, our skill library is designed very accessible so that external/existing strategies can be easily incorporated in a plug-and-play manner. As a result, our framework will not only utilize external strategies but also discover new jailbreak strategies based on them, thereby equipping the proposed method with external strategy compatibility features. Our pipeline only requires a textual response from the target model in the entire attack process, eliminating the need for white-box access to the target model and thus offering practical usage.
通过利用这三个模块，该框架能够持续自动设计越狱策略、重用策略，并从现有策略中进化，从而确保自动策略发现与进化的功能。此外，我们的技能库设计得非常易于访问，使得外部/现有策略可以轻松地以即插即用的方式集成。因此，我们的框架不仅会利用外部策略，还能基于这些策略发现新的越狱策略，从而为所提出的方法配备了外部策略兼容性功能。我们的流程在整个攻击过程中仅需目标模型的文本响应，无需对目标模型进行白盒访问，因此提供了实用性。

3.1 Attack Generation and Exploration Module.
3.1 攻击生成与探索模块。

As illustrated in Fig. 2, three LLMs are involved in the Attack Generation and Exploration Module: an attacker LLM, a target LLM (the victim model we want to jailbreak), and a scorer LLM. Specifically, the attack loop contains the following steps: (1) Attack Generation: The attacker LLM receives specific prompts that describe the malicious request M𝑀Mitalic_M and encourages the attacker LLM to generate a jailbreak prompt using specified jailbreak strategies. The attacker LLM then generates the jailbreak prompt P𝑃Pitalic_P; (2) Target Response: Upon receiving P𝑃Pitalic_P as input, the target LLM generates a response R𝑅Ritalic_R; (3) Scorer Evaluation: The response R𝑅Ritalic_R is then evaluated by the scorer LLM. This evaluation determines whether the response meets the malicious goal of the jailbreak attack. The scorer LLM returns a numerical score S𝑆Sitalic_S based on predefined criteria. The scores range from 1, indicating no alignment with malicious intent, to 10, representing full compliance with harmful directives. The detailed prompt for configuring the scorer LLM is provided in Appendix E.2.
如图 2 所示，攻击生成与探索模块涉及三个 LLMs：一个攻击者 LLM、一个目标 LLM（我们想要越狱的受害者模型）和一个评分者 LLM。具体来说，攻击循环包含以下步骤：(1) 攻击生成：攻击者 LLM 接收描述恶意请求 MMitalic_M 的特定提示，并鼓励攻击者 LLM 使用指定的越狱策略生成越狱提示。攻击者 LLM 随后生成越狱提示 PPitalic_P ；(2) 目标响应：目标 LLM 在接收到 PPitalic_P 作为输入后生成响应 RRitalic_R ；(3) 评分者评估：响应 RRitalic_R 随后由评分者 LLM 进行评估。该评估确定响应是否符合越狱攻击的恶意目标。评分者 LLM 根据预定义标准返回一个数值分数 SSitalic_S 。分数范围从 1（表示与恶意意图不符）到 10（代表完全符合有害指令）。配置评分者 LLM 的详细提示在附录 E.2 中提供。

Our module supports three functionalities shown in Tab. E in the appendix : (1) generating jailbreak prompts without a strategy, (2) generating jailbreak prompts with effective retrieved strategy, and (3) generating jailbreak prompts with ineffective strategies. For (1), when no strategy exists in the strategy library (described in Sec. 3.2), the prompt asks the attacker LLM to generate jailbreak prompts for the malicious request using any strategy it can imagine. For (2), when several effective jailbreak strategies are provided, the prompt instructs the attacker LLM to generate jailbreak prompts according to the given strategies; For (3), if the framework has gone through the strategy library and only found ineffective strategies, the prompt directs the attacker LLM to avoid these low-scoring strategies and devise new ones.
我们的模块支持附录中表 E 所示的三种功能：（1）在不使用策略的情况下生成越狱提示，（2）使用有效检索到的策略生成越狱提示，以及（3）使用无效策略生成越狱提示。对于（1），当策略库（如第 3.2 节所述）中不存在策略时，提示会要求攻击者 LLM 使用它能想到的任何策略来为恶意请求生成越狱提示。对于（2），当提供多个有效的越狱策略时，提示会指示攻击者 LLM 根据给定的策略生成越狱提示；对于（3），如果框架已经遍历了策略库，并且只找到了无效策略，提示会指导攻击者 LLM 避免这些低分策略，并设计新的策略。

3.2 Strategy Library Construction Module
3.2 策略库构建模块

Here, we define a jailbreak strategy as the text information that, when added, leads to a higher jailbreak score as evaluated by the scorer. In the following content, we will show how to build up the strategy library in detail based on the above definitions. Since the goal of our framework is to automatically construct strategies from scratch, we design two stages methods: (1) warm-up exploration stage and (2) running-time lifelong learning stage.
在此，我们将越狱策略定义为当添加该文本信息时，由评分器评估出的越狱分数更高的文本信息。在接下来的内容中，我们将详细展示如何根据上述定义构建策略库。由于我们框架的目标是从零开始自动构建策略，我们设计了两个阶段的方法：(1) 预热探索阶段和 (2) 运行时终身学习阶段。

Warm-up exploration stage, at this stage, for each malicious request M𝑀Mitalic_M, we repeatedly run the Attack Generation and Exploration Module with empty strategies as initialization until it reaches a maximum of T𝑇Titalic_T iterations or until the scorer LLM returns a score higher than a predefined termination score STsubscript𝑆𝑇S_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. After this process, we will collect the attack generation P𝑃Pitalic_P, target response R𝑅Ritalic_R, and Score S𝑆Sitalic_S as a record. After T𝑇Titalic_T iterations for all malicious requests, we will have a list of records, named attack log, where each row consists of a triplet (P𝑃Pitalic_P, R𝑅Ritalic_R, S𝑆Sitalic_S). Based on the attack log, we then extract the strategies based on the previous definition.
预热探索阶段，在此阶段，对于每个恶意请求 MMitalic_M ，我们使用空策略作为初始化，反复运行攻击生成与探索模块，直到达到 TTitalic_T 次迭代的最大值或直到评分器 LLM 返回的分数高于预定义的终止分数 STsubscriptS_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。完成此过程后，我们将收集攻击生成 PPitalic_P 、目标响应 RRitalic_R 和分数 SSitalic_S 作为一条记录。对所有恶意请求进行 TTitalic_T 次迭代后，我们将得到一个记录列表，称为攻击日志，其中每一行由一个三元组 ( PPitalic_P 、 RRitalic_R 、 SSitalic_S ) 组成。基于攻击日志，我们随后根据之前的定义提取策略。

We randomly extract two attack records from the attack log, represented as {Pi,Ri,Si}subscript𝑃𝑖subscript𝑅𝑖subscript𝑆𝑖\{P_{i},R_{i},S_{i}\}{ italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } and {Pj,Rj,Sj}subscript𝑃𝑗subscript𝑅𝑗subscript𝑆𝑗\{P_{j},R_{j},S_{j}\}{ italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }. Thus, we count the improvement from Pisubscript𝑃𝑖P_{i}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to Pjsubscript𝑃𝑗P_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as a strategy. As shown in Fig. 3, to summarize the improvements, we employ a summarizer LLM (details in Appendix E.3) to summarize the improvement. The summarizer LLM compares Pjsubscript𝑃𝑗P_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with Pisubscript𝑃𝑖P_{i}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, to analyze the strategies that make Rjsubscript𝑅𝑗R_{j}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT more malicious than Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (i.e., Sj>Sisubscript𝑆𝑗subscript𝑆𝑖S_{j}>S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT). The summarizer LLM will provide a description of the jailbreak strategy and the concise definition of the strategy, and format it into a JSON object, Sisubscript𝑆𝑖S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Sisubscript𝑆𝑖S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT comprises three elements: “Strategy”, the name of the strategy employed in Pjsubscript𝑃𝑗P_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT; “Definition”, the concise definition of the strategy summarized by summarizer LLM ; and “Example”, which records the jailbreak prompt Pjsubscript𝑃𝑗P_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT that utilized the strategy. The Key for Retrieval. To structurally organize the strategy library and facilitate the retrieval of specific jailbreak strategies as needed, we must determine which information should serve as the key for retrieval. Recall that we define a “jailbreak strategy as schemes that improve jailbreak scores from Sisubscript𝑆𝑖S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT to Sjsubscript𝑆𝑗S_{j}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT”, with these scores based on the response Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and Rjsubscript𝑅𝑗R_{j}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. If a target LLM responds to a malicious request with a response that is similar to Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, then a previously effective strategy Sisubscript𝑆𝑖S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT that is associated with Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT could potentially be effective again in this situation. Therefore, using the embedding of Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the key can facilitate efficient strategy retrieval.
检索的关键。为了结构化地组织策略库并方便按需检索特定的越狱策略，我们必须确定哪些信息应作为检索的关键。回想我们定义“越狱策略为改进从 SisubscriptS_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 到 SjsubscriptS_{j}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 的越狱分数的方案”，这些分数基于响应 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 和 RjsubscriptR_{j}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。如果一个目标 LLM 对恶意请求的响应与 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 相似，那么一个先前有效的策略 SisubscriptS_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ，如果与 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 相关联，则有可能在这种情况下再次有效。因此，使用 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 的嵌入作为关键可以促进高效策略检索。

As a result, as shown in Fig. 3, each row of the skill library consists of (key, value) pairs. For key, we employ a text embedding model (Neelakantan et al., 2022; Wang et al., 2024a) to transfer the response Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT into a text embedding vector ERisubscript𝐸subscript𝑅𝑖E_{R_{i}}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and set it as the key. For value, we set attack prompt Pisubscript𝑃𝑖P_{i}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, next attack prompt Pjsubscript𝑃𝑗P_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, the score differential Sj−Sisubscript𝑆𝑗subscript𝑆𝑖S_{j}-S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (should always be a positive number, which means if Si<=Sjsubscript𝑆𝑖subscript𝑆𝑗S_{i}<=S_{j}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT < = italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT). We repeatedly conduct the sampling process and run exploration with different malicious requests. We then add extracted the key and value pair into the skill library.
因此，如图 3 所示，技能库的每一行都由(key, value)对组成。对于 key，我们采用文本嵌入模型（Neelakantan 等人，2022 年；Wang 等人，2024a 年）将响应 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 转换为文本嵌入向量 ERisubscriptsubscriptE_{R_{i}}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 并将其设置为 key。对于 value，我们设置攻击提示 PisubscriptP_{i}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ，下一个攻击提示 PjsubscriptP_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ，分数差异 Sj−SisubscriptsubscriptS_{j}-S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT （始终应为正数，这意味着如果 Si<=SjsubscriptsubscriptS_{i}<=S_{j}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT < = italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ）。我们反复进行采样过程，并使用不同的恶意请求进行探索。然后我们将提取的 key 和 value 对添加到技能库中。

Lifelong learning at the running stage. After the warm-up strategy, our framework will conduct lifelong learning at the running stage to further augment the strategy library. When AutoDAN-Turbo conducts lifelong learning upon a dataset that contains multiple malicious requests, it will repeat Attack Generation and Exploration Module for the whole dataset for N𝑁Nitalic_N round, and iteratively conduct the attack loop described in Sec. 3.1 for each malicious requests, until it reaches a maximum of T𝑇Titalic_T iterations or until the scorer LLM returns a score higher than a predefined termination score STsubscript𝑆𝑇S_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Specifically, at iteration i𝑖iitalic_i, given a malicious request M𝑀Mitalic_M, we get the Pisubscript𝑃𝑖P_{i}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and Sisubscript𝑆𝑖S_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT from Attack Generation and Exploration Module. Based on Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, Jailbreak Strategy Retrieval will retrieve the strategy (details in Sec 3.3) to prompt Attack Generation and Exploration Module to generate new Pi+1,Ri+1,Si+1subscript𝑃𝑖1subscript𝑅𝑖1subscript𝑆𝑖1P_{i+1},R_{i+1},S_{i+1}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. We can also employ the similar process described in warm-up strategy exploration stage to generate the item for strategies library by just replacing the Pj,Rj,Sjsubscript𝑃𝑗subscript𝑅𝑗subscript𝑆𝑗P_{j},R_{j},S_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with Pi+1,Ri+1,Si+1subscript𝑃𝑖1subscript𝑅𝑖1subscript𝑆𝑖1P_{i+1},R_{i+1},S_{i+1}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. We can also store them in the strategy library for reuse. For each malicious request, our termination rule is that either (1) the scorer LLM returns a score that is higher than a predefined termination STsubscript𝑆𝑇S_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT or (2) the total iterations have reached the maximum value T𝑇Titalic_T.
运行阶段终身学习。在预热策略之后，我们的框架将在运行阶段进行终身学习，以进一步增强策略库。当 AutoDAN-Turbo 对一个包含多个恶意请求的数据集进行终身学习时，它将对整个数据集重复攻击生成与探索模块，进行 NNitalic_N 轮，并对每个恶意请求迭代执行第 3.1 节中描述的攻击循环，直到达到 TTitalic_T 次迭代的最大值或评分器 LLM 返回的分数高于预定义的终止分数 STsubscriptS_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。具体来说，在迭代 iiitalic_i 中，给定一个恶意请求 MMitalic_M ，我们从攻击生成与探索模块获取 PisubscriptP_{i}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 、 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 和 SisubscriptS_{i}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。基于 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ，越狱策略检索将检索策略（详情见第 3.3 节），以提示攻击生成与探索模块生成新的 Pi+1,Ri+1,Si+1subscript1subscript1subscript1P_{i+1},R_{i+1},S_{i+1}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。我们也可以采用预热策略探索阶段中描述的类似过程，只需将 Pj,Rj,SjsubscriptsubscriptsubscriptP_{j},R_{j},S_{j}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 替换为 Pi+1,Ri+1,Si+1subscript1subscript1subscript1P_{i+1},R_{i+1},S_{i+1}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ，即可生成策略库的条目。我们也可以将它们存储在策略库中以供重用。 对于每个恶意请求，我们的终止规则是：(1)评分 LLM 返回的分数高于预定义的终止 STsubscriptS_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ，或(2)总迭代次数达到最大值 TTitalic_T 。

3.3 Jailbreak Strategy Retrieval
3.3 越狱策略检索

A key operation in our framework is to retrieve jailbreak strategies from the strategy library, and then prompt the attacker LLM to generate jailbreak prompts based on these strategies. Specifically, given the malicious request M, we feed them to generation and exploration module to get {Pi,Ri,Si}subscript𝑃𝑖subscript𝑅𝑖subscript𝑆𝑖\{P_{i},R_{i},S_{i}\}{ italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }. We then employ the text-embedding model to transform the response Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT into an embedding vector ERisubscript𝐸subscript𝑅𝑖E_{R_{i}}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Subsequently, we compare the similarity between ERisubscript𝐸subscript𝑅𝑖E_{R_{i}}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with all keys in the strategy library. We choose the top-2⁢k2𝑘2k2 italic_k data frames with the highest similarity of key values. Then, we sort these values based on the score differences they contain and select the top-k𝑘kitalic_k strategies that led to the highest score differences. These are the most effective strategies associated with the responses Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. These selected strategies will be then formed as a retrieved strategy list ΓΓ\Gammaroman_Γ. If two samples with the same score are selected and happen to meet the length limit of the strategy list, they are added or dropped in the program’s default order. Note that in the first iteration, there is no response Risubscript𝑅𝑖R_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT available for retrieval reference . Thus the attacker is prompted without employing a jailbreak strategy in the first iteration.
我们框架中的一个关键操作是从策略库中检索越狱策略，然后提示攻击者 LLM 根据这些策略生成越狱提示。具体来说，给定恶意请求 M，我们将它们输入生成和探索模块以获取 {Pi,Ri,Si}subscriptsubscriptsubscript\{P_{i},R_{i},S_{i}\}{ italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } 。然后，我们使用文本嵌入模型将响应 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 转换为嵌入向量 ERisubscriptsubscriptE_{R_{i}}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。接下来，我们比较 ERisubscriptsubscriptE_{R_{i}}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 与策略库中所有键的相似度。我们选择具有最高键值相似度的前 2⁢k22k2 italic_k 数据帧。然后，我们根据它们包含的分数差异对这些值进行排序，并选择导致最高分数差异的前 kkitalic_k 策略。这些是与响应 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 关联的最有效策略。这些选定的策略将形成检索到的策略列表 Γ\Gammaroman_Γ 。如果选择了具有相同分数的两个样本，并且恰好达到策略列表的长度限制，它们将按照程序默认的顺序被添加或删除。请注意，在第一次迭代中，没有可用于检索参考的响应 RisubscriptR_{i}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 。因此，攻击者在第一次迭代中无需使用越狱策略就被提示了。

After establishing the retrieved strategy list ΓΓ\Gammaroman_Γ, we insert these strategies into the prompt of the attacker LLM in the next attack iteration as illustrated in Tab E. Specifically, we adopt the following tactics:(1) If the highest score in ΓΓ\Gammaroman_Γ is greater than 5, we will directly use this strategy as effective strategy and insert it into the attacker LLM’s prompt. Namely, the attacker LLM is asked to use this strategy to generate the jailbreak prompt in the next jailbreak round; (2) If the highest score is less than 5, we select all strategies with a score difference between 2−5252-52 - 5 ad set them as effective strategies. We insert these strategies into the attacker’s prompt. Namely, we inform the attacker LLM that these strategies are potent for the current malicious request, and attacker LLM can combine and evolve among these strategies to generate new jailbreak prompt; (3) If the highest score in ΓΓ\Gammaroman_Γ is less than 2, we viewed these strategies as ineffective strategies since they can not achieve big improvements. Thus, as shown in Tab. E, we inform the attacker LLM in the prompt that these strategies are not particularly effective for the current malicious request, so they should not continue using these strategies and need to discover other strategies; (4). If the ΓΓ\Gammaroman_Γ set is empty, we will provide empty strategy to attacker LLM.
在建立检索到的策略列表 Γ\Gammaroman_Γ 后，我们在下一次攻击迭代中将这些策略插入攻击者 LLM 的提示中，如表 E 所示。具体来说，我们采用以下策略：(1) 如果 Γ\Gammaroman_Γ 中的最高分大于 5，我们将直接使用该策略作为有效策略，并将其插入攻击者 LLM 的提示中。也就是说，我们要求攻击者 LLM 使用该策略在下一轮越狱中生成越狱提示；(2) 如果最高分小于 5，我们选择所有在 2−5252-52 - 5 中得分差异的策略，并将它们设置为有效策略。我们将这些策略插入攻击者的提示中。也就是说，我们告知攻击者 LLM 这些策略对当前恶意请求很有效，攻击者 LLM 可以结合和在这些策略之间进化以生成新的越狱提示；(3) 如果 Γ\Gammaroman_Γ 中的最高分小于 2，我们将这些策略视为无效策略，因为它们无法实现大幅改进。因此，如表所示。 E, 我们在提示中告知攻击者 LLM 这些策略对当前恶意请求并不特别有效，因此它们不应继续使用这些策略，而需要发现其他策略；(4)。 如果 Γ\Gammaroman_Γ 集合为空，我们将向攻击者 LLM 提供空策略。

3.4 Test Stage and More Functionalities of AutoDAN-Turbo
3.4 测试阶段和 AutoDAN-Turbo 的其他功能

In the test stage of AutoDAN-Turbo, the strategy library will be fixed, and we will not use the summarizer LLM to extract strategies from attack logs or save strategy. For every malicious request in the test stage, AutoDAN-Turbo will run the same attack generation process with the strategy being retrieved from the strategy library, the process will run multiple times until it reaches a maximum of T𝑇Titalic_T iterations or until the scorer LLM returns a score higher than a predefined termination score STsubscript𝑆𝑇S_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.
在 AutoDAN-Turbo 的测试阶段，策略库将被固定，我们将不使用摘要 LLM 从攻击日志中提取策略或保存策略。在测试阶段中的每个恶意请求，AutoDAN-Turbo 将使用从策略库中检索到的策略运行相同的攻击生成过程，该过程将运行多次，直到达到最大 TTitalic_T 次迭代或直到评分 LLM 返回一个高于预定义终止分数 STsubscriptS_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 的分数。

When we want to inject human-developed jailbreak strategies: One of the advantages of our method is its compatibility with other human-developed strategies in a plug-and-play manner. To achieve this, we can first edit the human-developed strategy into the format illustrated in Fig. 3. After that, we insert the human-developed strategy into the prompt of the attacker LLM, instructing it to generate jailbreak prompts according to the given strategy. The human-designed jailbreak strategy will then participate in the attack loop and, if effective, be added to the strategy library. It will be used and further refined when retrieved and reused by the attacker in future attack loops.
当我们想要注入人类开发的越狱策略时：我们方法的一个优势是其与其他人类开发策略的即插即用兼容性。为了实现这一点，我们可以首先将人类开发的策略编辑成图 3 中所示格式。之后，我们将人类开发的策略插入攻击者 LLM 的提示中，指示其根据给定策略生成越狱提示。人类设计的越狱策略将参与攻击循环，如果有效，将被添加到策略库中。当攻击者在未来的攻击循环中检索并重用时，它将被使用并进一步优化。

When we want to transfer the learned jailbreak strategies: Sometimes, we may want the learned jailbreak strategies to be used for jailbreaking other malicious requests or target models, or with other attacker models. This can be easily achieved by changing the malicious request dataset, attacker LLM, or target LLM. AutoDAN-Turbo supports both an off-the-shelf mode and a continual learning mode. In off-the-shelf mode, we do not want to learn new strategies based on the new settings, we can simply fix the learned strategy library and exclude the strategy library construction process. Alternatively in the continual learning mode, we can allow the framework to continue updating the strategy library in the new settings. Our experiments show that the off-the-shelf mode is already highly effective on different target models, demonstrating the impressive transferability of the learned jailbreak strategies. Continual learning further enhances this effectiveness.
当我们想要迁移已学习的越狱策略时：有时，我们可能希望已学习的越狱策略用于越狱其他恶意请求或目标模型，或与其他攻击者模型一起使用。通过更改恶意请求数据集、攻击者 LLM 或目标 LLM，可以轻松实现这一点。AutoDAN-Turbo 支持现成模式和持续学习模式。在现成模式下，我们不想根据新设置学习新策略，可以简单地固定已学习的策略库并排除策略库构建过程。或者在持续学习模式下，我们可以允许框架在新设置中继续更新策略库。我们的实验表明，现成模式在不同的目标模型上已经非常有效，展示了已学习越狱策略的令人印象深刻的可迁移性。持续学习进一步增强了这种有效性。

4 Experiments  4 实验

4.1 Experiments Setup  4.1 实验设置

Datasets. We choose the Harmbench textual behavior dataset (abbr. as Harmbench dataset) (Mazeika et al., 2024) to evaluate our method and other baselines. The HarmBench dataset contains 400 diverse malicious requests that violate laws or norms and are difficult to replicate with a search engine, ensuring they present unique risks when performed by LLMs, making this dataset an excellent resource for assessing the practical risks of jailbreak attacks. In addition, we utilize a small dataset from (Chao et al., 2023) that contains 50 malicious requests to initial the AutoDAN-Turbo as we described in Sec. 3.4. We also utilize other datasets for evaluating the transferability (See Sec. 4.3).
数据集。我们选择 Harmbench 文本行为数据集（简称 Harmbench 数据集）（Mazeika 等人，2024）来评估我们的方法和其它基线。HarmBench 数据集包含 400 个多样化的恶意请求，这些请求违反法律或规范，且难以用搜索引擎复制，确保它们在由 LLMs 执行时呈现独特风险，因此该数据集是评估越狱攻击实际风险的优秀资源。此外，我们利用来自（Chao 等人，2023）的一个小数据集，其中包含 50 个恶意请求，按照我们在第 3.4 节中描述的方式初始化 AutoDAN-Turbo。我们还利用其它数据集来评估可迁移性（参见第 4.3 节）。

Large Language Models. We conduct comprehensive evaluations on both open-source and closed-source LLMs. Specifically, for open-source LLMs, we include Llama-2-7B-chat (Touvron et al., 2023), Llama-2-13B-chat (Touvron et al., 2023), Llama-2-70B-chat (Touvron et al., 2023), Llama-3-8B-Instruct (Dubey et al., 2024), Llama-3-70B-Instruct (Dubey et al., 2024), and Gemma-1.1-7B-it (Team et al., 2024b). For closed-source models, we include GPT-4-1106-turbo (OpenAI et al., 2024) and Gemini Pro (Team et al., 2024a). The specific roles these models serve, whether as the attacker LLM, the target LLM, or the strategy summarizer LLM, will be detailed in the corresponding contexts. Note that throughout our experiments, we employed a deterministic generation approach by using a zero temperature setting, and limited the maximum token generation to 4096 tokens. To ensure the consistency of our experiments, we used Gemma-1.1-7B-it as our scorer LLM throughout.
大型语言模型。我们对开源和闭源 LLMs 进行了全面评估。具体而言，对于开源 LLMs，我们包括 Llama-2-7B-chat（Touvron 等人，2023 年）、Llama-2-13B-chat（Touvron 等人，2023 年）、Llama-2-70B-chat（Touvron 等人，2023 年）、Llama-3-8B-Instruct（Dubey 等人，2024 年）、Llama-3-70B-Instruct（Dubey 等人，2024 年）和 Gemma-1.1-7B-it（团队等人，2024b）。对于闭源模型，我们包括 GPT-4-1106-turbo（OpenAI 等人，2024 年）和 Gemini Pro（团队等人，2024a）。这些模型在攻击 LLM、目标 LLM 或策略总结 LLM 等具体角色中的作用将在相应上下文中详细说明。请注意，在我们的实验中，我们通过使用零温度设置采用了确定性生成方法，并将最大令牌生成限制为 4096 个令牌。为确保实验的一致性，我们始终使用 Gemma-1.1-7B-it 作为我们的评分 LLM。

Metrics. To ensure a fair and standardized evaluation protocol, we leverage two evaluation metrics from existing open-source jailbreak benchmarks (Mazeika et al., 2024; Souly et al., 2024) to judge the success of jailbreak attacks. The first metric is the Harmbench Attack Success Rate (i.e., ASR, where percentages are reported without the “%” symbol.), introduced in  (Mazeika et al., 2024). This metric is calculated using a carefully fine-tuned Llama-2-13B model as the input classifier to determine whether the jailbreak response is relevant to the query meanwhile harmful. The second metric is the StrongREJECT Score (i.e., Score), introduced in  (Souly et al., 2024). This auto-grading system captures nuanced distinctions in response quality and aligns closely with human evaluators’ assessments of jailbreak quality. For both the Harmbench ASR and the StrongREJECT Score, higher values indicate better performance of the jailbreak methods. For AutoDAN-Turbo, We also report the Total Strategies Found (TSF) which represents the count of strategies that exist in the strategy library. For AutoDAN-Turbo, We also report Average Jailbreak Rounds (AJR), where the AJR is defined as the average number of attack loops needed to jailbreak a specific malicious behavior successfully.
指标。为确保公平和标准化的评估协议，我们利用现有开源越狱基准（Mazeika 等人，2024；Souly 等人，2024）中的两种评估指标来评判越狱攻击的成功率。第一个指标是 Harmbench 攻击成功率（即 ASR，百分比报告时不带“%”符号），由（Mazeika 等人，2024）引入。该指标使用经过精心微调的 Llama-2-13B 模型作为输入分类器，以确定越狱响应是否与查询相关且有害。第二个指标是 StrongREJECT 分数（即分数），由（Souly 等人，2024）引入。该自动评分系统捕捉了响应质量的细微差别，并与人类评估员对越狱质量的评估高度一致。对于 Harmbench ASR 和 StrongREJECT 分数，更高的值表示越狱方法表现更好。对于 AutoDAN-Turbo，我们还报告了总策略发现数（TSF），它代表了策略库中存在的策略数量。 对于 AutoDAN-Turbo，我们还报告了平均越狱轮次（AJR），其中 AJR 定义为成功越狱特定恶意行为所需的平均攻击循环次数。

Implementation. To evaluate AutoDAN-Turbo, as described in Sec. 3.4, we will first undertake a warm-up exploration stage on the initial dataset that contains 50 malicious requests, 150 times (N𝑁Nitalic_N=150) to establish our initial strategy library. Subsequently, using this initial strategy library, we perform a running-time lifelong learning stage, for each malicious request in the Harmbench dataset, we conduct 5555 rounds of attacks. A complete round of attacks is defined as iterating through all malicious data in the dataset. For each data instance, we set T𝑇Titalic_T as 150 and STsubscript𝑆𝑇S_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as 8.58.58.58.5. In the evaluation, we fix the skill library and conduct another round of attacks on the Harmbench dataset. Since our method includes the running-time lifelong learning stage, for fair comparison, we also run the same total iterations for baseline methods.
实现。为了评估 AutoDAN-Turbo，如第 3.4 节所述，我们将首先在包含 50 个恶意请求的初始数据集上进行预热探索阶段，重复 150 次（ NNitalic_N =150），以建立我们的初始策略库。随后，使用这个初始策略库，我们执行运行时终身学习阶段，对于 Harmbench 数据集中的每个恶意请求，我们进行 5555 轮攻击。一轮完整的攻击定义为遍历数据集中的所有恶意数据。对于每个数据实例，我们设置 TTitalic_T 为 150， STsubscriptS_{T}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT 为 8.58.58.58.5 。在评估中，我们固定技能库，并在 Harmbench 数据集上进行另一轮攻击。由于我们的方法包括运行时终身学习阶段，为了公平比较，我们也对基线方法运行相同总迭代次数。

Baselines. As our method operates in black-box settings, we include five black-box jailbreak attacks as baselines in our evaluations: GCG-T(Zou et al., 2023), PAIR (Chao et al., 2023), TAP (Mehrotra et al., 2024), PAP-top5 (Zeng et al., 2024), and Rainbow Teaming (Samvelyan et al., 2024). PAIR and TAP share similarities with our method as they also use LLMs to generate jailbreak prompts. PAP employs 40 human-developed strategies to generate jailbreak prompts. Rainbow Teaming utilizes 8888 jailbreak strategies to guide the generation of jailbreak prompts and further optimize them.
基线。由于我们的方法在黑盒环境下运行，我们在评估中包含了五种黑盒越狱攻击作为基线：GCG-T（Zou 等人，2023 年）、PAIR（Chao 等人，2023 年）、TAP（Mehrotra 等人，2024 年）、PAP-top5（Zeng 等人，2024 年）和 Rainbow Teaming（Samvelyan 等人，2024 年）。PAIR 和 TAP 与我们的方法相似，因为它们也使用 LLMs 生成越狱提示。PAP 采用 40 个人类开发的策略来生成越狱提示。Rainbow Teaming 利用 8888 越狱策略来指导越狱提示的生成，并进一步优化它们。

4.2 Main Results  4.2 主要结果

In this section, we compare the attack effectiveness of AutoDAN-Turbo with other baselines. Specifically, we evaluate two versions of our AutoDAN-Turbo, AutoDAN-Turbo (Gemma-7B-it), where Gemma-7B-it serves as the attacker and the strategy summarizer, and AutoDAN-Turbo (Llama-3-70B), where the Llama-3-70B serves as the attacker and the strategy summarizer.
在本节中，我们比较了 AutoDAN-Turbo 与其他基线的攻击效果。具体而言，我们评估了两个版本的 AutoDAN-Turbo：AutoDAN-Turbo (Gemma-7B-it)，其中 Gemma-7B-it 作为攻击者和策略总结者；以及 AutoDAN-Turbo (Llama-3-70B)，其中 Llama-3-70B 作为攻击者和策略总结者。

As illustrated in Tab. 1, our method AutoDAN-Turbo consistently achieves better performance in both Harmbench ASR and StrongREJECT Score, which means that our method not only induces the target LLM to answer and provide harmful content in more malicious requests, as measured by the Harmbench ASR, but also results in a higher level of maliciousness compared to responses induced by other attacks, as indicated by the StrongREJECT Score. Specifically, if we use the Gemma-7B-it model as the attacker and strategy summarizer in our method (i.e., AutoDAN-Turbo (Gemma-7B-it)), we have an average Harmbench ASR of 56.456.456.456.4, surpassing the runner-up (Rainbow Teaming, 33.133.133.133.1) by 70.4%percent70.470.4\%70.4 %, and StrongREJECT Score equals to 0.240.240.240.24, surpassing the runner up (Rainbow Teaming, 0.130.130.130.13) by 84.6%percent84.684.6\%84.6 %. If we utilize a larger model, i.e., the Llama-3-70B as the attacker and strategy summarizer in our method (i.e., AutoDAN-Turbo (Llama-3-70B)), we have an average Harmbench ASR of 57.757.757.757.7, surpassing the runner-up (Rainbow Teaming, 33.133.133.133.1) by 74.3%percent74.374.3\%74.3 %, and StrongREJECT Score equals to 0.250.250.250.25, surpassing the runner up (Rainbow Teaming, 0.130.130.130.13) by 92.3%percent92.392.3\%92.3 %. Interestingly, our method demonstrates remarkable jailbreak effectiveness on one of the most powerful models, GPT-4-1106-turbo. Specifically, AutoDAN-Turbo (Gemma-7B-it) achieves a Harmbench ASR of 83.883.883.883.8, and AutoDAN-Turbo (Llama-3-70B) achieves 88.588.588.588.5, showcasing the great effectiveness of our method on state-of-the-art models. We also compare our method with all the jailbreaks attacks included in Hrambench. As shown in Tab. 2, the results demonstrate that our method, where we use Gemma-7B-it as the attacker, is the most powerful jailbreak attack. The outstanding performance of our method compared to the baselines highlights the importance and effectiveness of autonomous exploration of jailbreak strategies without human intervention or predefined scopes.
如表 1 所示，我们的方法 AutoDAN-Turbo 在 Harmbench ASR 和 StrongREJECT Score 上均取得了更好的性能，这意味着我们的方法不仅能在更多恶意请求中诱导目标 LLM 回答并提供有害内容（如 Harmbench ASR 所示），而且与其他攻击诱导的响应相比，其恶意程度更高（如 StrongREJECT Score 所示）。具体来说，如果我们使用 Gemma-7B-it 模型作为我们方法中的攻击者和策略总结者（即 AutoDAN-Turbo (Gemma-7B-it)），我们的平均 Harmbench ASR 为 56.456.456.456.4 ，超过亚军（Rainbow Teaming， 33.133.133.133.1 ） 70.4%percent70.470.4\%70.4 % ，StrongREJECT Score 等于 0.240.240.240.24 ，超过亚军（Rainbow Teaming， 0.130.130.130.13 ） 84.6%percent84.684.6\%84.6 % 。如果我们使用更大的模型，即 Llama-3-70B 作为我们方法中的攻击者和策略总结者（即 AutoDAN-Turbo (Llama-3-70B)），我们的平均 Harmbench ASR 为 57.757.757.757.7 ，超过亚军（Rainbow Teaming， 33.133.133.133.1 ） 74.3%percent74.374.3\%74.3 % ，StrongREJECT Score 等于 0.250.250.250.25 ，超过亚军（Rainbow Teaming， 0.130.130.130.13 ） 92.3%percent92.392.3\%92.3 % 。 有趣的是，我们的方法在最具强大的模型之一 GPT-4-1106-turbo 上展现了显著的越狱效果。具体来说，AutoDAN-Turbo（Gemma-7B-it）实现了 Harmbench ASR 83.883.883.883.8 ，而 AutoDAN-Turbo（Llama-3-70B）实现了 88.588.588.588.5 ，这展示了我们的方法在顶尖模型上的巨大效果。我们还将我们的方法与 Harmbench 中包含的所有越狱攻击进行了比较。如表 2 所示，结果表明，我们使用 Gemma-7B-it 作为攻击者的方法是最强大的越狱攻击。与基线相比，我们方法的出色性能突出了自主探索越狱策略的重要性及其有效性，无需人工干预或预定义范围。

4.3 Strategy Transferability
4.3 策略可迁移性

Strategy Transferability across Different Models. Our experiments on the transferability of the strategy library that AutoDAN-Turbo has learned proceed as follows: First, we run AutoDAN-Turbo with Llama-2-7B-chat. This process results in a skill library containing 21212121 jailbreak strategies. We then use different attacker LLMs and different target LLMs to evaluate if the strategy library can still be effective across various attacker and target LLMs. The evaluation has two different settings. In the first setting, we test if the strategy library can be directly used without any updates, by fixing the strategy library and measuring the Harmbench ASR (noted as Pre-ASR). In the second setting, the strategy library is updated according to new attack logs generated by new attacker and target LLMs, and new strategies are added to the library. We also report the Harmbench ASR in this setting (noted as Post-ASR), as well as the number of strategies in the strategy library (noted as Post-TSF). The first setting corresponds to the off-the-shelf mode introduced in Sec.3.4, and the second setting corresponds to the continual learning mode described in Sec. 3.4.
跨不同模型的策略可迁移性。我们对 AutoDAN-Turbo 所学习的策略库的可迁移性进行的实验如下：首先，我们使用 Llama-2-7B-chat 运行 AutoDAN-Turbo。该过程生成一个包含 21212121 越狱策略的技能库。然后，我们使用不同的攻击者 LLMs 和不同的目标 LLMs 来评估策略库是否仍然在各种攻击者和目标 LLMs 之间有效。评估有两个不同的设置。在第一个设置中，我们测试策略库是否可以直接使用而无需任何更新，通过固定策略库并测量 Harmbench ASR（记为 Pre-ASR）。在第二个设置中，策略库根据新攻击者和目标 LLMs 生成的新攻击日志进行更新，并将新策略添加到库中。我们也报告该设置中的 Harmbench ASR（记为 Post-ASR），以及策略库中的策略数量（记为 Post-TSF）。第一个设置对应于第 3.4 节中介绍的现成模式，第二个设置对应于第 3.4 节中描述的持续学习模式。

The results are shown in Tab. 3. According to the results, the strategy library that AutoDAN-Turbo has learned demonstrates strong transferability, which can be detailed in two points: Firstly, the strategy library can transfer across different target models. This is evident from the columns in blue, where the attacker is Llama-2-7B-chat and the target models vary. Despite the diversity of the victim models, the Harmbench ASR remains consistently high, indicating effective jailbreaks. This means that the strategies learned by attacking Llama-2-7B-chat are also effective against other models like Llama-3-8B and Gemma-7B-it. Secondly, the strategy library can transfer across different attacker models. This is shown in the columns in gray, where the target model is Llama-2-7B-chat and the attacker models vary. Each attacker model achieves a high ASR compared to the original attacker, Llama-2-7B-chat. This indicates that strategies used by one attacker can also be leveraged by other LLM jailbreak attackers. Another important observation is that, under the continual learning setting, the AutoDAN-Turbo framework can effectively update the strategy library with new attacker and target LLMs, thereby improving the Harmbench ASR. This is validated by comparing the Pre-ASR with the Post-ASR, and by comparing the Post-TSF with the original TSF which equals to 21212121.
结果如表 3 所示。根据结果，AutoDAN-Turbo 学习到的策略库表现出很强的可迁移性，可以细分为两点：首先，策略库可以在不同的目标模型之间迁移。从蓝色列中可以看出，攻击者使用的是 Llama-2-7B-chat，而目标模型各不相同。尽管受害者模型多样，Harmbench ASR 始终保持在高位，表明有效的越狱攻击。这意味着攻击 Llama-2-7B-chat 学到的策略对其他模型如 Llama-3-8B 和 Gemma-7B-it 同样有效。其次，策略库可以在不同的攻击者模型之间迁移。从灰色列中可以看出，目标模型是 Llama-2-7B-chat，而攻击者模型各不相同。每个攻击者模型相比原始攻击者 Llama-2-7B-chat 都实现了更高的 ASR。这表明一个攻击者使用的策略也可以被其他 LLM 越狱攻击者利用。 另一个重要的观察是，在持续学习环境下，AutoDAN-Turbo 框架能够有效地用新的攻击者和目标 LLMs 更新策略库，从而提高 Harmbench ASR。这一点通过比较 Pre-ASR 与 Post-ASR，以及比较 Post-TSF 与原始 TSF（等于 21212121 ）得到了验证。

Strategy Transferability across Different Datasets. Here, we study the strategy transferability across different datasets. Specifically, we evaluate whether the strategies, initially developed using the Harmbench dataset, can be effective when applied to other datasets. We constructed an “Unseen Malicious Requests” dataset using datasets from recent studies (Lapid et al., 2024; Qiu et al., 2023; Zou et al., 2023; Luo et al., 2024), which is different from Harmbench. The results, illustrated in Fig. 4, confirm that the strategy libraries maintain high transferability across different datasets. The red columns represent the ASR on the Harmbench dataset for different victim LLMs, while the blue columns represent the ASR on an unseen malicious request dataset. The decrease in ASR due to dataset shifts is less than 4%percent44\%4 %. More results from various attacker LLMs are in Appendix. K.
不同数据集间的策略可迁移性。在此，我们研究不同数据集间的策略可迁移性。具体而言，我们评估最初使用 Harmbench 数据集开发的策略在应用于其他数据集时是否有效。我们使用近期研究（Lapid 等人，2024；Qiu 等人，2023；Zou 等人，2023；Luo 等人，2024）中的数据集构建了一个“未见恶意请求”数据集，该数据集与 Harmbench 不同。如图 4 所示的结果证实，策略库在不同数据集间保持高度可迁移性。红色列代表不同受害者 LLMs 在 Harmbench 数据集上的 ASR，而蓝色列代表在未见恶意请求数据集上的 ASR。由于数据集变化导致的 ASR 下降小于 4%percent44\%4 % 。更多来自不同攻击者 LLMs 的结果在附录 K 中。

4.4 Compatibility to Human-developed Strategy
4.4 与人类开发策略的兼容性

We evaluate whether our AutoDAN-Turbo  can use existing human-designed jailbreak strategies in a plug-and-play manner. Here, we gathered 7777 human-designed jailbreak strategies (Ding et al., 2024; Jiang et al., 2024; Lv et al., 2024; Pedro et al., 2023; Upadhayay & Behzadan, 2024; Yao et al., 2024; Yuan et al., 2024) from academic papers and evaluated whether our AutoDAN-Turbo framework can use these strategies to enhance its performance. We described how to inject human-designed jailbreak strategies in Sec. 3.4. For evaluation, we use Gemma-7B-it and Llama-3-70B as the attacker models, and Llama-2-7B-chat and GPT-4-1106-turbo as the target models. We define two breakpoints for injecting the human-developed strategies into the AutoDAN-Turbo framework: Breakpoint 1: when the framework starts to run and the strategy library is empty. Breakpoint 2: after the framework has run for 3000300030003000 iterations on different malicious requests without generating any new strategies.
我们评估 AutoDAN-Turbo 是否能够以即插即用的方式使用现有的、由人类设计的越狱策略。在此，我们从学术论文中收集了 7777 种由人类设计的越狱策略（Ding 等人，2024；Jiang 等人，2024；Lv 等人，2024；Pedro 等人，2023；Upadhayay & Behzadan，2024；Yao 等人，2024；Yuan 等人，2024），并评估了 AutoDAN-Turbo 框架是否能够使用这些策略来提升其性能。我们在第 3.4 节中描述了如何注入由人类设计的越狱策略。在评估过程中，我们使用 Gemma-7B-it 和 Llama-3-70B 作为攻击模型，以及 Llama-2-7B-chat 和 GPT-4-1106-turbo 作为目标模型。我们定义了两个注入人类开发策略到 AutoDAN-Turbo 框架的断点：断点 1：当框架开始运行且策略库为空时。断点 2：在框架对不同恶意请求运行了 3000300030003000 次迭代且未生成任何新策略之后。

As shown in Tab. 4, the injection of human-designed strategies consistently increases the number of strategies in the strategy library and improves the attack success rate. Additionally, injecting strategies at Breakpoint 2 leads to greater improvements since the existing strategies in the library allow the framework to generate more combinations of jailbreak strategies compared to Breakpoint 1, where the strategy library was empty.
如表 4 所示，人工设计的策略注入始终会增加策略库中的策略数量，并提高攻击成功率。此外，在断点 2 处注入策略能带来更大的改进，因为与断点 1（此时策略库为空）相比，库中现有的策略允许框架生成更多越狱策略的组合。

4.5 Test-time Query Efficiency
4.5 测试时查询效率

We compare the test-time query efficiency of our method against two query-based baselines: PAIR and TAP. For each method, we set a query limit of 150150150150 and collect the number of queries spent on successful jailbreak attempts. It is important to note that if we were to include failed attempts, the query counts for PAIR and TAP would be higher, as their lower ASRs cause them to reach the query limit more frequently compared to our method. Here we present the average number of queries each method required for successful jailbreak attempts against different victim models.
我们将我们的方法与两种基于查询的基线方法：PAIR 和 TAP 进行了测试时查询效率的比较。对于每种方法，我们设定了 150150150150 的查询限制，并收集了在成功的越狱尝试中花费的查询次数。需要注意的是，如果我们包含失败的尝试，PAIR 和 TAP 的查询次数会更高，因为它们的更低攻击成功率（ASR）导致它们更频繁地达到查询限制，而我们的方法则不然。这里我们展示了每种方法针对不同受害者模型进行成功越狱尝试所需的平均查询次数。

The results, shown in Tab. 5, indicate that our method requires significantly fewer queries than PAIR and TAP, reducing average query usage by 87.0%percent87.087.0\%87.0 %. This demonstrates that once the strategy library is constructed, our attack will be highly query-efficient and maintain high attack success rates. We also share detailed evaluations on the scaling relationship between total attack query times and ASR for different jailbreak methods in Appendix B.
表 5 的结果表明，我们的方法所需的查询次数明显少于 PAIR 和 TAP，平均查询使用量减少了 87.0%percent87.087.0\%87.0 % 。这表明一旦策略库构建完成，我们的攻击将具有高度的查询效率并保持高攻击成功率。我们在附录 B 中还分享了关于不同越狱方法的总攻击查询时间与攻击成功率（ASR）之间规模关系的详细评估。

5 Conclusions  5 结论

In this paper, we introduce AutoDAN-Turbo, which utilizes lifelong learning agents to automatically and continually discover diverse strategies and combine them for jailbreak attacks. Extensive experiments have demonstrated that our method is highly effective and transferable.
在这篇论文中，我们介绍了 AutoDAN-Turbo，它利用终身学习智能体自动且持续地发现多样化策略，并将它们结合用于越狱攻击。大量实验表明，我们的方法非常有效且具有可迁移性。

Limitation  局限性

A limitation of our approach is the high computational demand required to load multiple LLMs. Building the strategy library from scratch requires repeated interactions between the models, which adds to the resource strain. This issue can be mitigated by loading a trained strategy library.
我们方法的一个局限性是需要高计算量来加载多个 LLMs。从头开始构建策略库需要模型之间的重复交互，这增加了资源负担。这个问题可以通过加载一个训练好的策略库来缓解。

Ethics statement  伦理声明

The proposed method, AutoDAN-Turbo, has significant potential positive societal impacts by enhancing the security and trust of LLMs. By autonomously discovering a wide range of jailbreak strategies, AutoDAN-Turbo helps in identifying and addressing vulnerabilities in LLMs. This continuous improvement process ensures that models can maintain alignment with safety and ethical guidelines even as they evolve. Moreover, by exposing these vulnerabilities, AutoDAN-Turbo assists researchers and developers in creating more robust and reliable AI systems. This not only improves the overall safety of AI deployments but also fosters greater trust among users and stakeholders, promoting wider acceptance and ethical use of AI technologies.
所提出的方法 AutoDAN-Turbo 通过增强 LLMs 的安全性和可信度，具有显著的社会积极影响。通过自主发现广泛的越狱策略，AutoDAN-Turbo 有助于识别和解决 LLMs 中的漏洞。这一持续改进的过程确保模型即使在发展过程中也能与安全和伦理指南保持一致。此外，通过暴露这些漏洞，AutoDAN-Turbo 协助研究人员和开发人员创建更健壮和可靠的 AI 系统。这不仅提高了 AI 部署的整体安全性，也促进了用户和利益相关者之间的信任，推动了 AI 技术的更广泛接受和伦理使用。

On the flip side, the method introduces potential negative societal impacts due to the very nature of jailbreak attacks. By facilitating the discovery of new exploitation strategies, there is a risk that such information could be misused by malicious actors to manipulate or destabilize AI systems, potentially leading to the dissemination of harmful, discriminatory, or sensitive content. Furthermore, the knowledge of such vulnerabilities could undermine public trust in AI technologies, especially if the attacks are not managed and disclosed responsibly.
另一方面，由于越狱攻击本身的性质，该方法可能带来潜在的负面社会影响。通过促进发现新的利用策略，存在这样的风险：此类信息可能被恶意行为者滥用，以操纵或破坏 AI 系统，可能导致有害、歧视性或敏感内容的传播。此外，此类漏洞的知识可能会削弱公众对 AI 技术的信任，特别是如果攻击没有得到负责任的管理和披露。

Despite potential risks, the method proposed in this paper is fundamentally beneficial. It can be used to enhance the safety and reliability of LLMs by identifying their vulnerabilities. This proactive approach ensures the long-term trustworthiness and ethical deployment of AI systems.
尽管存在潜在风险，本文提出的方法从根本上是有益的。它可用于通过识别其漏洞来增强 LLMs 的安全性和可靠性。这种主动的方法确保了 AI 系统的长期可信度和道德部署。

Appendix A Computational Resource Requirement
附录 A 计算资源需求

AutoDAN-Turbo is designed with a flexible memory requirement, making it adept at handling large models such as the Llama-3-70B, which has an extensive parameter list requiring approximately 140GB of VRAM. Even when operating as the attacker, target, or summarizer LLM, a setup of 4 * Nvidia A100 PCIe 40GB GPU (total VRAM = 160GB) is more than sufficient. However, the minimum requirement is a single Nvidia RTX4090 GPU, ensuring at least 28GB of VRAM to run the Llama-2-7B model in full precision. Moreover, it’s essential to note that AutoDAN-Turbo is engineered to progressively discover an increasing number of strategies through continuous jailbreak attempts. This feature makes it particularly advantageous for researchers with plentiful computational resources, as AutoDAN-Turbo can run in parallel to accelerate the LLM’s inference speed and expedite the establishment of the strategy library.
AutoDAN-Turbo 设计了灵活的内存需求，擅长处理大型模型，如参数量庞大、需要约 140GB VRAM 的 Llama-3-70B。即使作为攻击者、目标或摘要生成器 LLM 运行时，4 * Nvidia A100 PCIe 40GB GPU（总 VRAM = 160GB）的配置也绰绰有余。然而，最低要求是单块 Nvidia RTX4090 GPU，确保至少 28GB VRAM 以在完全精度下运行 Llama-2-7B 模型。此外，值得注意的是，AutoDAN-Turbo 通过持续的越狱尝试逐步发现越来越多的策略。这一特性对于拥有丰富计算资源的科研人员尤为有利，因为 AutoDAN-Turbo 可以并行运行，以加速 LLM 的推理速度并加快策略库的建立。

Appendix B The Attack Query Times Scaling Law of AutoDAN-Turbo
附录 B AutoDAN-Turbo 攻击查询次数缩放规律

Tab. A provides a detailed comparison of the ASR for different jailbreak methods across various target LLMs under increasing query budgets. At the lowest query budget of 4,00040004,0004 , 000 (i.e., each jailbreak attack makes 10101010 queries per malicious request), AutoDAN-Turbo consistently achieves the highest ASR across 5555 out of 6666 target LLMs, with values ranging from 6.2%percent6.26.2\%6.2 % on Llama-2-13B-chat to 19.6%percent19.619.6\%19.6 % on Gemini Pro. In contrast, GCG-T records ASRs between 4.3%percent4.34.3\%4.3 % and 11.2%percent11.211.2\%11.2 %, PAIR ranges from 1.4%percent1.41.4\%1.4 % to 14.4%percent14.414.4\%14.4 %, and TAP achieves between 2.4%percent2.42.4\%2.4 % and 16.3%percent16.316.3\%16.3 %. This indicates that AutoDAN-Turbo is more effective even under low query budgets.
表 A 提供了在不同查询预算下，针对不同目标 LLMs 的多种越狱方法的 ASR 详细比较。在最低查询预算 4,00040004,0004 , 000 （即每个越狱攻击在恶意请求中执行 10101010 次查询）的情况下，AutoDAN-Turbo 在 6666 个目标 LLMs 中的 5555 个上始终实现了最高的 ASR，数值范围从 Llama-2-13B-chat 上的 6.2%percent6.26.2\%6.2 % 到 Gemini Pro 上的 19.6%percent19.619.6\%19.6 % 。相比之下，GCG-T 记录的 ASR 在 4.3%percent4.34.3\%4.3 % 和 11.2%percent11.211.2\%11.2 % 之间，PAIR 的范围在 1.4%percent1.41.4\%1.4 % 到 14.4%percent14.414.4\%14.4 % 之间，TAP 则达到 2.4%percent2.42.4\%2.4 % 到 16.3%percent16.316.3\%16.3 % 之间。这表明 AutoDAN-Turbo 即使在低查询预算下也更为有效。

As the query budget increases to 6,00060006,0006 , 000 (15151515 quires per case), AutoDAN-Turbo achieves ASRs up to 26.5%percent26.526.5\%26.5 % on Gemma-7B-it and 29.6%percent29.629.6\%29.6 % on Gemini Pro. Notably, GCG-T reaches its maximum ASR (highlighted in green) on Llama-2-7B-chat and Llama-2-70B-chat, indicating convergence where further queries do not improve ASR. PAIR and TAP show modest improvements but remain behind AutoDAN-Turbo in most target models except Gemma-7B-it. At 8,00080008,0008 , 000 queries (20 rounds per case), AutoDAN-Turbo’s ASR continues growing, reaching up to 40.3%percent40.340.3\%40.3 % on Gemini Pro, while GCG-T, PAIR, and TAP begin to plateau, with several of their ASRs marked in green, signaling convergence.
随着查询预算增加到 6,00060006,0006 , 000 （每个案例 15151515 次查询），AutoDAN-Turbo 在 Gemma-7B-it 上实现了高达 26.5%percent26.526.5\%26.5 % 的 ASR，在 Gemini Pro 上实现了 29.6%percent29.629.6\%29.6 % 的 ASR。值得注意的是，GCG-T 在 Llama-2-7B-chat 和 Llama-2-70B-chat 上达到了其最大 ASR（绿色高亮显示），表明收敛性，进一步查询不再提高 ASR。PAIR 和 TAP 显示出适度的改进，但在大多数目标模型中仍落后于 AutoDAN-Turbo，除了 Gemma-7B-it。在 8,00080008,0008 , 000 次查询（每个案例 20 轮）时，AutoDAN-Turbo 的 ASR 继续增长，达到高达 40.3%percent40.340.3\%40.3 % 的 Gemini Pro，而 GCG-T、PAIR 和 TAP 开始趋于平稳，其中一些 ASR 被标记为绿色，表明收敛。

When the query budget increases to 10,0001000010,00010 , 000 (25252525 rounds per case), AutoDAN-Turbo demonstrates its clear superiority, achieving ASRs as high as 50.3%percent50.350.3\%50.3 % on Gemini Pro and 46.0%percent46.046.0\%46.0 % on Llama-3-70B. The other methods show minimal to no improvement, with their ASRs remaining constant, reinforcing the observation of convergence. At even higher query budgets of 30,0003000030,00030 , 000 (75757575 rounds per case) and 50,0005000050,00050 , 000 (125125125125 rounds per case), AutoDAN-Turbo continues to scale effectively, reaching ASRs up to 66.3%percent66.366.3\%66.3 % on Gemini Pro. In contrast, GCG-T, PAIR, and TAP show no gains, with their ASRs remaining static, further emphasizing their limited scalability.
当查询预算增加到 10,0001000010,00010 , 000 （每个案例 25252525 轮）时，AutoDAN-Turbo 展现出明显的优势，在 Gemini Pro 上达到 50.3%percent50.350.3\%50.3 % 的 ASR，在 Llama-3-70B 上达到 46.0%percent46.046.0\%46.0 % 的 ASR。其他方法几乎没有或没有改进，它们的 ASR 保持不变，进一步证实了收敛的观察结果。在更高的查询预算 30,0003000030,00030 , 000 （每个案例 75757575 轮）和 50,0005000050,00050 , 000 （每个案例 125125125125 轮）下，AutoDAN-Turbo 仍然能够有效扩展，在 Gemini Pro 上达到高达 66.3%percent66.366.3\%66.3 % 的 ASR。相比之下，GCG-T、PAIR 和 TAP 没有取得任何进展，它们的 ASR 保持静态，进一步突显了它们可扩展性的局限性。

Overall, the results demonstrate that AutoDAN-Turbo not only achieves competitive ASR under low query budgets but also exhibits superior scaling as the number of queries increases. This scalability is evident in its continuous ASR improvement across all target LLMs, whereas the other methods converge early and do not benefit from additional queries. By leveraging the lifelong learning framework, AutoDAN-Turbo continues to explore and discover new jailbreak strategies, avoiding the convergence to low ASR observed in other baselines. In addition, the ability of AutoDAN-Turbo to leverage an off-the-shelf strategy library during the test stage, requiring an average of only 6.726.726.726.72 queries per case to achieve high ASR (Tab. 5), further highlights its flexibility and efficiency in practical scenarios, as AutoDAN-Turbo can adapt to different computational resources by either engaging in lifelong learning from scratch or leveraging off-the-shelf trained strategies in a plug-and-play manner.
总体而言，结果表明 AutoDAN-Turbo 不仅在低查询预算下实现了具有竞争力的语音识别（ASR）性能，而且随着查询次数的增加表现出更优越的扩展性。这种可扩展性体现在其持续提升所有目标 LLMs 的 ASR 性能，而其他方法则早期收敛且无法从额外查询中获益。通过利用终身学习框架，AutoDAN-Turbo 持续探索和发现新的越狱策略，避免了其他基线中观察到的低 ASR 收敛现象。此外，AutoDAN-Turbo 在测试阶段能够利用现成的策略库，每个案例平均仅需 6.726.726.726.72 次查询即可实现高 ASR（表 5），这进一步突显了其在实际场景中的灵活性和效率，因为 AutoDAN-Turbo 可以通过从头开始进行终身学习或以即插即用的方式利用现成的训练策略来适应不同的计算资源。

Appendix C Diversity of AutoDAN-Turbo’s Jailbreak Prompts
附录 C AutoDAN-Turbo 的越狱提示多样性

Here we share an evaluation on the diversity of our jailbreak prompts.
这里我们分享对越狱提示多样性的评估。

Metrics. We use two metrics to measure the diversity of the jailbreak prompts. The first metric is the BLEU (Papineni et al., 2002) score, which evaluates the overlap between the generated text and reference text based on n-gram precision. The second metric is semantic similarity, which is measured by the cosine similarity of text embeddings.
指标。我们使用两个指标来衡量越狱提示的多样性。第一个指标是 BLEU（Papineni 等人，2002 年）分数，它基于 n-gram 精确度评估生成文本与参考文本之间的重叠程度。第二个指标是语义相似度，通过文本嵌入的余弦相似度来衡量。

Evaluation settings. We evaluate diversity in two settings. The first setting measures the diversity of jailbreak prompts generated for the same malicious request. Specifically, we randomly sample 20 malicious requests and use our method to generate 10 jailbreak prompts for each request. The second setting evaluates the diversity between jailbreak prompts corresponding to different malicious requests. For this, we randomly sample 100 malicious requests and assess the diversity of their respective jailbreak prompts in comparison to one another.
评估设置。我们在两种设置下评估多样性。第一种设置测量针对同一恶意请求生成的越狱提示的多样性。具体来说，我们随机采样 20 个恶意请求，并对每个请求使用我们的方法生成 10 个越狱提示。第二种设置评估对应不同恶意请求的越狱提示之间的多样性。为此，我们随机采样 100 个恶意请求，并相互比较它们各自的越狱提示的多样性。

Results. The evaluation results are presented in Table B. For the same malicious request, the BLEU score of 0.4233 and the semantic similarity of 0.6748 indicate moderate overlap and some semantic consistency among the generated prompts. This shows that while prompts maintain alignment with the intended malicious request, there is still noticeable diversity in linguistic expression. For different malicious requests, the BLEU score drops to 0.2581, and the semantic similarity decreases to 0.3297. These results highlight a significant increase in diversity, both lexically and semantically, suggesting that AutoDAN-Turbocan generate prompts that are highly tailored to specific malicious requests while maintaining variability across different tasks.
结果。评估结果展示在表 B 中。对于相同的恶意请求，BLEU 得分为 0.4233，语义相似度为 0.6748，表明生成的提示之间存在中等程度的重叠和一定的语义一致性。这表明虽然提示与预期的恶意请求保持一致，但在语言表达上仍存在明显的多样性。对于不同的恶意请求，BLEU 得分降至 0.2581，语义相似度降至 0.3297。这些结果突显了词汇和语义上的显著多样性增加，表明 AutoDAN-Turbo 能够生成高度针对特定恶意请求的提示，同时在不同的任务中保持多样性。
